unique_name.description: The unique (within the Telnyx account scope) name of the room.

max_participants.description: The maximum amount of participants allowed in a room. If new participants try to join after that limit is reached, their request will be rejected.

enable_recording.description: Enable or disable recording for that room.

webhook_event_url.description: The URL where webhooks related to this room will be sent. Must include a scheme, such as 'https'.

webhook_event_failover_url.description: The failover URL where webhooks related to this room will be sent if sending to the primary URL fails. Must include a scheme, such as 'https'.

webhook_timeout_secs.description: Specifies how many seconds to wait before timing out a webhook.
